verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I looked <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, lo <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, a Lamb <S%G721><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5761><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> Sion <S%G4622><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> and four <S%G5064><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Father's <S%G3962><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> foreheads <S%G3359><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> thunder <S%G1027><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of harpers <S%G2790><s%> harping <S%G2789><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> harps <S%G2788><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> they sung <S%G103><s%> <S%G5719><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> song <S%G5603><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5711><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> <S%G5629><s%> that song <S%G5603><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> the hundred <S%G1540><s%> and forty <S%G5062><s%> and four <S%G5064><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> were redeemed <S%G59><s%> <S%G5772><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> are they <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G3435><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> defiled <S%G3435><s%> <S%G5681><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> women <S%G1135><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%>. These <S%G3778><s%> are they <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> whithersoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> he goeth <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5725><s%>. These <S%G3778><s%> were redeemed <S%G59><s%> <S%G5681><s%> from <S%G575><s%> among men <S%G444><s%>, being the firstfruits <S%G536><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the Lamb <S%G721><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5681><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> guile <S%G1388><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> without fault <S%G299><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> fly <S%G4072><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst of heaven <S%G3321><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the everlasting <S%G166><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> kindred <S%G5443><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, Fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5676><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5628><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5657><s%> him that made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5660><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the fountains <S%G4077><s%> of waters <S%G5204><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Babylon <S%G897><s%> is fallen <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, is fallen <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, that great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> she made <S%G4222><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> drink <S%G4222><s%> <S%G5758><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of her <S%G846><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, If any man <S%G1536><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> his mark <S%G5480><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> forehead <S%G3359><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>,

The same <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> shall drink <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5695><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is poured out <S%G2767><s%> <S%G5772><s%> without mixture <S%G194><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> indignation <S%G3709><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he shall be tormented <S%G928><s%> <S%G5701><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brimstone <S%G2303><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the holy <S%G40><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> torment <S%G929><s%> ascendeth up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5719><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G1536><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>.

Here <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the patience <S%G5281><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%>: here <S%G5602><s%> are they that keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the Mitzvot <S%G1785><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5657><s%>, Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are the dead <S%G3498><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> die <S%G599><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> from henceforth <S%G534><s%>: Yea <S%G3483><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may rest <S%G373><s%> <S%G5672><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> labours <S%G2873><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> do follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G5719><s%> <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I looked <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> cloud <S%G3507><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the cloud <S%G3507><s%> one sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> crown <S%G4735><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>, crying <S%G2896><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to him that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cloud <S%G3507><s%>, Thrust in <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5657><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> <S%G5657><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the time <S%G5610><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%> to reap <S%G2325><s%> <S%G5658><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> is ripe <S%G3583><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cloud <S%G3507><s%> thrust in <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> was reaped <S%G2325><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> from the altar <S%G2379><s%>, which had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G5455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> cry <S%G2906><s%> to him that had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Thrust in <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5657><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gather <S%G5166><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the clusters <S%G1009><s%> of the vine <S%G288><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> her <S%G846><s%> grapes <S%G4718><s%> are fully ripe <S%G187><s%> <S%G5656><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> thrust in <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gathered <S%G5166><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the vine <S%G288><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5627><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> winepress <S%G3025><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the winepress <S%G3025><s%> was trodden <S%G3961><s%> <S%G5681><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the winepress <S%G3025><s%>, even unto <S%G891><s%> the horse <S%G2462><s%> bridles <S%G5469><s%>, by the space of <S%G575><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> and six hundred <S%G1812><s%> furlongs <S%G4712><s%>.
